extendedInfo.description: Titan Message Scheduler allows users to schedule, manage and send text messages to family and friends.* Ability to send messages using Google Voice and standard text messages.* Schedule re-occurring messages on a hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or yearly basis.* Manage, search and sort scheduled messages.* Group text message scheduling. Can be used for group announcements with Google Voice or standard Text. * Paid Version available with added features: * Ability to send mass text messages instantly * Ability to create and use drafts for future texts * Enhanced user interface.Keywords: Email, sms,schedule, scheduler, google voice, sms scheduler, schedalls, auto sms, schedule sms wishes, handcent sms, google voice schedule text messages,

reviews.title: I finally know who won\'t get their message.
reviews.comment: I waited for the contacts to display more than just a name, but also the number so I don\'t send a text to a landline. However, messages only send after I restart my phone... Any body got an app that restarts the phone on schedule?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful little app!
reviews.comment: I used this app a few times and it worked. My only complaint is the text sent doesn\'t show up in the phone\'s messaging app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Trying to schedule texts via Google Voice and app crashes when the message is to be sent.
reviews.author: Laura Topliffe

reviews.title: Looks cool but doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: As others have said, crashed every single time a Google voice message is scheduled to send. Too bad because the app looks great
reviews.author: Ben Martin

reviews.title: Didn\'t work with Google voice
reviews.comment: I use google voice exclusively for texting. This app required me to log in (why doesn\'t it just use my google account?) then popped up a \"verifying credentials\" screen which failed. My other Gvoice related apps have no problem with my login information, so I don\'t know what gives.
reviews.author: Brian Terrel

reviews.title: No Contacts
reviews.comment: It does not allow me to select contacts when i click on the contacts button. Nothing opens. Good GUI. Samsung Galaxy S3 4G JB 4.1.2
reviews.author: Sheeraz Ahmed

reviews.title: Doesn\'t send timed Gvoice Messages, Nexus S 4g
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking forever for an app that will send timed Google texts. Hoped this would do it. It never sends my scheduled texts. ;/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: I tried to schedule a text but it just sent right away
reviews.author: Eric Marion

reviews.title: how to see all my contacts and add them
reviews.comment: what happened to the ability to see all me contacts and select each one manually to sent the mass txt to... It only allows typing a letter to see a name now... LAME & PLEASE FIX THIS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Tried to schedule a text, it sends immediately
reviews.author: Will DeGra

reviews.title: Group text with Google Voice
reviews.comment: Works great for sending multiple people text messages using google voice. If only there were a \'send now\' option and the scheduling functionality was optional...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Very useful and creative. It\'s something I can use in my daily life. I really like it! Once you get familiarized with it, it is awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Functional sometimes, can be buggy
reviews.comment: Annoying text entry bugs, can be a pain to select/remove contacts, has currently missed two scheduled texts in a row via GV.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool but
reviews.comment: Should have better labeling on the buttons/not intuitive.  Installed this just to send a text later but accidentally sent it now.  Huge mistake.  Not cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great until 4.0.4 freezes now
reviews.comment: Love the app but now crashes a lot under 4.0.4.please fix the stability, freezes the whole phone sometime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: I scheduled a test message for myself, which went through OK. But the real one scheduled for later didn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sent a text to my entire address book.
reviews.comment: The app sent a text to my whole address book. I entered a number manually instead of from my contacts. Terrible bug
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfectly with messaging app & Google voice.
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Would be nice to have desktop version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works with Google Voice
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for text scheduler that would work with GVoice & this does. Nice added bonuses: composition of Google Voice texts with character count and ability to save drafts (something missing from GVoice app). I don\'t like how it asks for Google login info in the app (instead of using Google\'s acct verification) but I use 2-step authentication, so PW I entered into this app won\'t work anywhere else.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unreliable!
reviews.comment: Failed to send scheduled message. Not worth the effort.
reviews.author: A Google User
